com.ic.invisiblecollector

Class DebtApiFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ic.invisiblecollector.ApiBase
      • com.ic.invisiblecollector.DebtApiFacade

  • public class DebtApiFacade
extends com.ic.invisiblecollector.ApiBase
    Immutable and thread safe class for making operations on the /debts API endpoint.

    For object construction see IcApiFacade

    Author:
    ros

    • Method Detail

      • registerNewDebt

        public Debt registerNewDebt(Debt debt)
                     throws IcException
        Register a new debt related to a customer.

        See registerNewDebt(Map) for more details

        Parameters:
        debt - the debt information to register. null values are discarded.
        Throws:
        IcException

      • registerNewDebt

        public Debt registerNewDebt(java.util.Map<DebtField,java.lang.Object> debtInfo)
                     throws IcException
        Register a new debt related to a customer.
        Parameters:
        debtInfo - a map containing the debt information to register. null values are not discarded. See DebtField for a description of the attributes and their possible values. See DebtField.assertCorrectlyInitialized(Map) for a list of the mandatory attributes.
        Returns:
        an up-to-date object with the debt information.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
        See Also:
        registerNewDebt(Debt)

      • requestDebtInfo

        public Debt requestDebtInfo(IRoutable routable)
                     throws IcException
        Request debt information from the database.

        See requestDebtInfo(String) for more details

        Parameters:
        routable - an object (such as a Debt object) containing the id of the debt.
        Throws:
        IcException

      • requestDebtInfo

        public Debt requestDebtInfo(java.lang.String debtId)
                     throws IcException
        Request debt information from the database.
        Parameters:
        debtId - the id of the debt whose information is requested.
        Returns:
        up-to-date debt information.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
        See Also:
        requestDebtInfo(IRoutable)
